text: Eric Sykes CBE (4 May 1923 â€“ 4 July 2012) was a British actor, comedian, writer and director.Telegraph obituary He was born in Oldham, Lancashire. Sykes worked mostly on radio and television. He and Hattie Jacques starred in Sykes and A..., Sykes and a Big, Big Show and Sykes. He Died of Short of Caner, He was 89 on 4th July 2012, He was In the 3 TV News Sky, BBC and ITV News. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1923 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Actors from Lancashire Category:British television directors Category:British television writers Category:Comedians from Lancashire Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Writers from Lancashire Category:People from Oldham Category:Deaf people
